structure.unit: ARTICLE VI. LOCAL HOUSING ASSISTANCE PROGRAM

text.section:
Sec. 17-105. Local housing partnership.
The Housing Finance Authority of Miami-Dade County, Office of Community and Economic Development, Miami-Dade Housing Agency or its successor department may develop a local housing partnership so that the implementation of the local housing assistance program involves other appropriate County agencies, local governments, lending institutions, housing developers, community based housing and service organizations, providers of professional services relating to affordable housing and any other persons or entities who can assist in providing housing or related support services. The partnership should encourage the use of combined resources to reduce housing costs for the targeted population.
